channel.title: Remaking Runescapes Quests [Pi]
channel.description:
[center]Hello Guy's I have decided to remake some runescape quest's and add them to my server I will probably release them when I'm done also. So leave feedback on what I can improve and I know my combats shitty so don't complain about that.
[u]To do[/u]: -Dragon Slayer (I might have to reconsider if it's to long) -Pirate's Treasure -Black Knights Fortress -Demon Slayer (Maybe) -Rune Mysteries And more.
[u]Quests already done[/u]: -Imp Catcher -Cook's Assistant -Restless Ghost -Vampyre Slayer -Doric's Quest
[u]Here's the vids[/u]:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UucCE79K0Ig
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xrdTTzz6fO8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-V0JaG6cms
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-wS7rs-Pt0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q5qV8Uw49xc[/center]
